metadata.title: USN-4661-1 -- Snapcraft vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Snapcraft includes the current directory when configuring LD_LIBRARY_PATH for application commands. If a user were tricked into installing a malicious snap or downloading a malicious library, under certain circumstances an attacker could exploit this to affect strict mode snaps that have access to the library and when launched from the directory containing the library.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4661-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  snapcraft-parser - 2.43.1+16.04.1 snapcraft - 2.43.1+16.04.1 snapcraft-examples - 2.43.1+16.04.1 No subscription required
